summary: This bill, H.R. 3572, amends Title 23 of the United States Code regarding the rural surface transportation grant program. It defines "covered county" based on agricultural production value and introduces the term "farm-to-market road." The bill mandates the Secretary of Transportation reserves 10% of program funds for grants for projects on farm-to-market roads within covered counties. It also requires the creation and annual update of a list of covered counties in consultation with the Secretary of Agriculture.
